nodes.text: The Borgle Bat Cave was a deep cavern system in the swamp lands of the Nabooian moon Rori. It was home to a high number of dangerous Borgle bats.

During the Galactic Civil War, the animal herder Fingers hunted borgle bat to their cave on Rori in order to capture some specimens for arena pit-fighting competition. In 1 ABY, xenobiologist Dusque Mistflier and bioengineer Tendau Nandon explored the cave to study its Borgle bat population.
